titleStmt.title: Of a degradation of gold made by an anti-elixir, a strange chymical narative.
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: An historical account of the degradation of gold by an anti-elixir.
Attributed to Robert Boyle--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
